Chamaleon:

Chamaleon almost jumped when he heard Orchestra's voice, when he 
noticed the friendly tone he calmed down... and shook Orchestra's 
hand "S-sorry, I'm a very nervous " said Chameleon "A bully bull 
wanted kill me and still I'm shaking like a leaf...I'm... well I need 
drink something...  Do you like Drink something too?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra::
> 
>     As soon as Orchestra saw Chameleon walking out of the CR 
Chamber, he had a new plan.  He put his gun away.  Orchestra spun out 
from the wall he was against and showed up in front of Chameleon.
> 
>     "Hey!  Buddy, in case you don't know, my name's Orchestra.  You 
must be Chameleon.  Hey, let's go somewhere, sit down and chat, get 
to know eachother better," Orchestra said as kindly as he could, and 
put out his hand for Chameleon to shake.
